channel.title: Connection problem
channel.description:
Hi :) i have this problem:
I created a runesccape server and i run runserver.bat it says Starting Darkcape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594. I connect in moparscape whith 0.0.0.0 to play it in my PC but yesterday i have created a no-ip and downloadded the NO-IP DUC because i have a dynamic IP. When i connect whit 0.0.0.0 in moparscape it connects but when i use the no-ip (darkrunescape.no-ip.org) it says "error connecting to server.Must be down.Clik "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own." I want to put it in the internet but i cant. I need help!!!!!

item.title: Connection problem
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Its usually because of the port, so make sure you put int he default port…

Read full topic

item.title: Connection problem
item.dc:creator: @HJKAS HJKAS
item.description:
@HJKAS wrote:

Hi i have this problem:

I created a runesccape server and i run runserver.bat it says Starting Darkcape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594.
I connect in moparscape whith 0.0.0.0 to play it in my PC but yesterday i have created a no-ip and downloadded the NO-IP DUC because i have a dynamic IP.
When i connect whit 0.0.0.0 in moparscape it connects but when i use the no-ip (darkrunescape.no-ip.org) it says “error connecting to server.Must be down.Clik “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.”
I want to put it in the internet but i cant.
I need help!!!
